quest.name: Moving Forward
journal: Despite the butterflies in his stomach, Chai-Nuzz is prepared to address the masses.

dialogue.name: KAISHIRR
dialogue.text: Sorry I wasn't much help. Still, seeing Master Chai go after those Talos was something, eh? Inspiring stuff.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I daresay the future of Eulmore has never looked brighter.

dialogue.name: DULIACHAI
dialogue.text: Thank you again for finding my husband. I confess, I was not expecting your return to be quite so grand!

dialogue.name: DULIACHAI
dialogue.text: That dear, sweet man. He is going to make the most wonderful mayor. I just know it!

dialogue.name: WRENDEN
dialogue.text: There is no time to lose. We must begin making preparations for the inaugural address. Once Master Chai has caught his breath, of course.

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: No need to fret, Forename. I have never felt better. <cough>

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: And not at all overawed by the prospect of addressing the assembled masses of Eulmore...

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: As for where to do it... If we're to accommodate everyone who might feasibly wish to attend, I suppose the only place large enough would be the Emergent.

dialogue.name: WRENDEN
dialogue.text: Then I will go and spread the word among the citizens─both free and bonded─that they are to assemble there to meet their new mayor.

dialogue.name: WRENDEN
dialogue.text: You there, uh...Kai-Shirr, was it? Would you go and inform the residents of Gatetown and the Derelicts?

dialogue.name: KAISHIRR
dialogue.text: 'Course I will!

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: Good lad. I will let the guards know not to bar the way to Vauthry's chambers.

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: ...It goes without saying that I expect the Warrior of Darkness to attend─assuming shehe's available? Might as well see it through to the bitter end, eh? The doorman at the Crown Lift will show you up.

dialogue.name: KAISHIRR
dialogue.text: Don't worry, I'll make sure everyone's there for Master Chai's big speech. So get yourself down to the Emergent! Go on!

dialogue.name: CHADDEN
dialogue.text: Ah, yes. Master Chai told us to expect you. The Emergent is already filling up with people of all persuasions─free and bonded, citizens and non-citizens.

dialogue.name: CHADDEN
dialogue.text: But for you, our guest of honor, we have reserved a place at the front. Right this way, misssir.

dialogue.name: KAISHIRR
dialogue.text: Seeing everyone come together like that... <sniff> It was beautiful, that was.

dialogue.name: WRENDEN
dialogue.text: Now our work can begin in earnest. I very much look forward to seeing this Eulmore for the people.

dialogue.name: DULIACHAI
dialogue.text: Wasn't he simply wonderful? Seeing him take charge of the room as he did! Oh, it reminds me why I fell for him in the first place...

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: The city of final pleasures, they used to call this place, back when the world was ending. But now...now I hope it will become the city of new endeavors.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: That was a fine speech, Master Chai. I believe your words stirred every soul in attendance.

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: Stirred them to action, I hope. If I have learned anything from all of this, it is that change begins with the individual.

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: 'Tis but a matter of finding the strength to take the first step.

dialogue.name: WRENDEN
dialogue.text: Assuming my fellow Eulmorans can, it shall be my honor and privilege to help them walk this road we have chosen.

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: But we must not forget the individuals who made all of these changes possible.

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: Were it within my power, I would carve a tribute to your heroism into the very stone upon which this city stands.

dialogue.name: DULIACHAI
dialogue.text: I hate to change the subject, darling...but now that you have officially taken office, have you given any thought to your mayoral seat...?

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: We will not be moving into the Emergent, dearest. It's too big, for one thing, and too far from the people for another. We will retain our current residence, and I will govern here in the Parlor.

dialogue.name: DULIACHAI
dialogue.text: Oh, I was hoping you'd say that! I much prefer the view from the Parlor.

dialogue.name: HATHENBET
dialogue.text: (-???-)Beggin' your pardon, Master Chai... But have you got time for a word?

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: Ah, y-yes. Yes of course, er...Hathen...bet?

dialogue.name: HATHENBET
dialogue.text: Aye, that's me. I liked your speech. But there's folk outside these walls as don't even have enough food to last till tomorrow, and more who're countin' their crumbs. If ye've a plan to change that, I want to help set things in motion.

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: Then we've much to discuss.

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: No sooner do I take office than my work begins in earnest. Well, I suppose I brought it upon myself. Thank you again for your help, Forename. I hope to see you again before long.

dialogue.name: KAISHIRR
dialogue.text: What a day... I dunno what it means exactly, but I do know I've got plenty to think about.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I sense we all have a great deal to consider.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I had resolved to remain here until such time as Eulmore's future was secured, but it is clear to me now that the city is in capable hands.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I have every confidence they will find their way, and I believe it is time we went on ours.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: With Master Chai at the helm, if only for the interim, I feel I can bid farewell to Eulmore, and return to the Source with no regrets.

dialogue.name: KAISHIRR
dialogue.text: So Alphinaud's leaving too, is he? Seems like everyone's moving on. Everything's changing...

dialogue.name: KAISHIRR
dialogue.text: I've been thinking about what I should do in all this. Like I told you, I spent most of my life dreaming about living here with my friends. In paradise.

dialogue.name: KAISHIRR
dialogue.text: That paradise is gone, but something better's taken its place. And I reckon I want to be a part of it.

dialogue.name: KAISHIRR
dialogue.text: This “Eulmore for the people” Master Chai's been going on about ain't gonna build itself, after all. Not that I'm much of a builder.

dialogue.name: KAISHIRR
dialogue.text: Me and my friends'll find a way to make a difference, though─help keep things changing for the better.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: A far nobler dream than the one to which you clung before─and one I am happy to say we share. Whatever path you choose, I will pray for your success.

dialogue.name: KAISHIRR
dialogue.text: Well, when you put it like that, there's no going back now, is there? We've got a few ideas on how we can do our bit. Just a matter of taking the first step!

obj.n: Vows of Virtue, Deeds of Cruelty
